name: Oh My Posh
description: A prompt theme engine for any shell with customizable themes and segments

version.description: Version of Oh My Posh to install. Use 'latest' or a specific version like 'v19.0.0'

theme.description: Built-in theme name to use as fallback (e.g., 'jandedobbeleer', 'powerlevel10k_rainbow', 'dracula', 'agnoster')

installPath.description: Directory where the oh-my-posh binary will be installed

shells.description: Comma-separated list of shells to configure (bash, zsh, fish)

settings.terminal.integrated.fontFamily: Hack Nerd Font, MesloLGS NF, FiraCode Nerd Font, JetBrainsMono Nerd Font, monospace
